# isMinimumDurationRestricted

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether samples of this type have a minimum time interval between the start and end dates.

## Declaration

```swift
var isMinimumDurationRestricted: Bool { get }
```

## Checking the Duration Restriction

- **minimumAllowedDuration**: The minimum duration if the sample type has a restricted duration.
- **isMaximumDurationRestricted**: A Boolean value that indicates whether samples of this type have a maximum time interval between the start and end dates.
- **maximumAllowedDuration**: The maximum duration if the sample type has a restricted duration.
